Package elki.persistent

Interface PageHeader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPageHeader, MkTreeHeader, RdKNNTreeHeader, TreeIndexHeader
    public interface PageHeader
    Defines the requirements for a header of a persistent page file. A header must at least store the size of a page in Bytes.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Elke Achtert

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getPageSize()
      Returns the size of a page in Bytes.
      int getReservedPages()
      Returns the number of pages necessary for the header
      void readHeader​(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
      Initializes this header from the specified file.
      default void readHeader​(java.nio.channels.FileChannel file)
      Read the header from an input file.
      int size()
      Returns the size of this header in Bytes.
      void writeHeader​(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Writes this header to the specified file.
      default void writeHeader​(java.nio.channels.FileChannel file)
      Read the header from an input file.
